list.title: Rand
list.description:
Rand returns a random byte slice of length n
Rand(n int) []byte

list.title: RandInt
list.description:
RandInt returns a random int
RandInt() int

list.title: ToBytes
list.description:
ToBytes converts given input to byte slice
ToBytes(...interface{}) []byte

list.title: ToString
list.description:
ToString converts given input to string
ToString(...interface{}) string

list.title: getNetworkPort
list.description:
getNetworkPort registers defaultPort and returns defaultPort if it is a colliding port with other protocols
getNetworkPort(port string, defaultPort string) string

list.title: isPortOpen
list.description:
isPortOpen checks if given port is open on host. timeout is optional and defaults to 5 seconds
isPortOpen(host string, port string, [timeout int]) bool

list.title: log
list.description:
log prints given input to stdout with [JS] prefix for debugging purposes
log(msg string)
log(msg map[string]interface{})

list.title: module:bytes~Buffer
list.description:
Buffer is a minimal buffer implementation over a byte slice
that is used to pack/unpack binary data in nuclei js integration.

list.title: module:ikev2~IKEMessage
list.description:
IKEMessage is the IKEv2 message. IKEv2 implements a limited subset of IKEv2 Protocol, specifically
the IKE_NOTIFY and IKE_NONCE payloads and the IKE_SA_INIT exchange.

list.title: module:ikev2~IKEMessage#AppendPayload
list.description: AppendPayload appends a payload to the IKE message

list.title: module:ikev2~IKEMessage#Encode
list.description: Encode encodes the final IKE message

list.title: module:kerberos~EnumerateUser
list.description: This method returns true if the user exists in the domain. If the user is not found, false is returned. If the user is found, true is returned. Optionally, the AS-REP hash is also returned if discovered.

list.title: module:ldap~CollectLdapMetadata
list.description: collects metadata from ldap server.

list.title: module:ldap~IsLdap
list.description: checks if the given host and port are running ldap server.

list.title: module:ldap~LdapClient
list.description:
Client is a client for ldap protocol in golang.
It is a wrapper around the standard library ldap package.

list.title: module:mssql~MSSQLClient#Connect
list.description:
Connect connects to MS SQL database using given credentials.
If connection is successful, it returns true.
If connection is unsuccessful, it throws an error.
The connection is closed after the function returns.

list.title: module:mssql~MSSQLClient#ConnectWithDB
list.description:
ConnectWithDB connects to MS SQL database using given credentials and database name.
If connection is successful, it returns true.
If connection is unsuccessful, it throws an error.
The connection is closed after the function returns.

list.title: module:mssql~MSSQLClient#IsMssql
list.description:
IsMssql checks if the given host is running MS SQL database.
If the host is running MS SQL database, it returns true.
If the host is not running MS SQL database, it throws an error.

list.title: module:mysql~MySQLClient#Connect
list.description: Connects to MySQL database using given credentials. The connection is closed after the function returns.

list.title: module:mysql~MySQLClient#ConnectWithDB
list.description: Connects to MySQL database using given credentials and database name. The connection is closed after the function returns.

list.title: module:mysql~MySQLClient#ExecuteQuery
list.description: Connects to Mysql database using given credentials and database name and executes a query on the db.

list.title: module:mysql~MySQLClient#IsMySQL
list.description: Checks if the given host is running MySQL database.

list.title: module:net~NetConn#Close
list.description: Close closes the connection.

list.title: module:net~NetConn#Recv
list.description: Recv receives data from the connection with a timeout. If N is 0, it will read up to 4096 bytes.

list.title: module:net~NetConn#RecvHex
list.description: RecvHex receives data from the connection with a timeout in hex format. If N is 0, it will read up to 4096 bytes.

list.title: module:net~NetConn#RecvString
list.description: RecvString receives data from the connection with a timeout. Output is returned as a string. If N is 0, it will read up to 4096 bytes.

list.title: module:net~NetConn#Send
list.description: Send sends data to the connection with a timeout.

list.title: module:net~NetConn#SendArray
list.description: SendArray sends array data to connection.

list.title: module:net~NetConn#SendHex
list.description: SendHex sends hex data to connection.

list.title: module:net~NetConn#SetTimeout
list.description: SetTimeout sets read/write timeout for the connection (in seconds).

list.title: module:net~Open
list.description: Open a connection with the specified protocol and address.

list.title: module:net~OpenTLS
list.description: Open a TLS connection with the specified protocol and address.

list.title: module:oracle~IsOracle checks if a host is running an Oracle server.
list.link: IsOracle checks if a host is running an Oracle server.

list.title: module:postgres~PGClient#Connect
list.description: Connects to Postgres database using given credentials. The connection is closed after the function returns.

list.title: module:postgres~PGClient#ConnectWithDB
list.description: Connects to Postgres database using given credentials and database name. The connection is closed after the function returns.

list.title: module:postgres~PGClient#ExecuteQuery
list.description: Connects to Postgres database using given credentials and database name and executes a query on the db.

list.title: module:postgres~PGClient#IsPostgres
list.description: Checks if the given host and port are running Postgres database.

list.title:
module:rdp~CheckRDPAuth checks if the given host and port are running rdp server
with authentication and returns their metadata.
list.link: CheckRDPAuth checks if the given host and port are running rdp server with authentication and returns their metadata.

list.title:
module:rdp~IsRDP checks if the given host and port are running rdp server.
If connection is successful, it returns true.
If connection is unsuccessful, it throws an error.
The Name of the OS is also returned if the connection is successful.
list.link: IsRDP checks if the given host and port are running rdp server. If connection is successful, it returns true. If connection is unsuccessful, it throws an error. The Name of the OS is also returned if the connection is successful.

list.title: module:redis~Connect
list.description: Connect to a Redis server.

list.title: module:redis~GetServerInfo
list.description: Get information about the Redis server.

list.title: module:redis~GetServerInfoAuth
list.description: Get information about the Redis server with authentication.

list.title: module:redis~IsAuthenticated
list.description: Check if the Redis server is authenticated.

list.title: module:redis~RunLuaScript
list.description: Run a Lua script on the Redis server.

list.title: module:smb~SMBClient
list.description: SMBClient is a client for SMB servers. Internally client uses github.com/zmap/zgrab2/lib/smb/smb driver and github.com/hirochachacha/go-smb2 driver.

list.title: module:smb~SMBClient#ConnectSMBInfoMode
list.description: ConnectSMBInfoMode tries to connect to provided host and port and discovery SMB information

list.title: module:smb~SMBClient#DetectSMBGhost
list.description: DetectSMBGhost tries to detect SMBGhost vulnerability by using SMBv3 compression feature.

list.title: module:smb~SMBClient#ListSMBv2Metadata
list.description: ListSMBv2Metadata tries to connect to provided host and port and list SMBv2 metadata.

list.title: module:smb~SMBClient#ListShares
list.description: ListShares tries to connect to provided host and port and list shares by using given credentials. Credentials cannot be blank. guest or anonymous credentials can be used by providing empty password.

list.title: module:smtp~IsSMTP checks if a host is running a SMTP server.
list.link: IsSMTP checks if a host is running a SMTP server.

list.title: module:ssh~HandshakeLog
list.description: HandshakeLog is a struct that contains information about the ssh connection.

list.title: module:ssh~SSHClient#Connect
list.description: Connect tries to connect to provided host and port with provided username and password with ssh.

list.title: module:ssh~SSHClient#ConnectSSHInfoMode
list.description: ConnectSSHInfoMode tries to connect to provided host and port.

list.title: module:ssh~SSHClient#ConnectWithKey
list.description: ConnectWithKey tries to connect to provided host and port with provided username and private_key.

list.title: module:vnc~IsVNC
list.description: Checks if a host is running a VNC server.

list.title: module:vnc~VNCClient
list.description: A minimal VNC client for nuclei scripts.
